data.text: @SenMastriano Ivermectin and hydracloriquil used to be listed on the CSC website but our government wants its citizens sick dying or dead for the 2026/7 invasion of China - who thanks C19 for helping make their job easier - I'd show video but phone was hacked and prevented sharing - all true.

@SenMastriano I know you're not interested in actual science and research but ivermectin works no better than a placebo to prevent severe disease from COVID-19.

https://t.co/AF1YkpoZUl
@BumblingDolt @SenMastriano Why are u so against the ability for patients to make informed decisions on medical treatment with their physician?

@BumblingDolt @SenMastriano That’s your opinion…..not based on fact.   What is it your business or any politicians business when it comes to treatment for a patient.   Politics should stay out of the way of patient care.   If a patient demands treatment, a doctor can still say no.

@reppertmichelle @SenMastriano No, he's trying to make it easier for patients to demand the drugs they want. And given the two specifically listed are hydroxychloroquine and ivermectin it's based purely on politics and not medical reasoning.
@pczz57 @SenMastriano We don’t do things based on “feelings” when facts show the result was accurate.
@SenMastriano Waiting for you to support Ukraine. Won’t hold my breath.
@SenMastriano If we just let you and those like you to your own devices, you'll exterminate yourselves. https://t.co/LTZRbpO4ci
